name: podamShouldHandleDoubleValuesWithThePodamDoubleValueAnnotation

testSteps.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.annotations.DoubleValuePojo

Then the object DoubleRangeValuesPojo ( doubleFieldWithMinValueOnly = 1.0    doubleFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 23.165970036387684    doubleFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 47.87279946604272    doubleFieldWithPreciseValue = 10.1245    doubleObjectFieldWithMinValueOnly = 1.0    doubleObjectFieldWithMaxValueOnly = 70.92664276705442    doubleObjectFieldWithMinAndMaxValue = 669.4103618324309    doubleObjectFieldWithPreciseValue = 10.1245     ) should not be null
Then the double value (0} should be greater or equal than 1.0
Then the double value 23.165970036387684 should be lower or equal than 100.0
Then the double value 47.87279946604272 should be between 1.0 and 1000.0
Then the double value 10.1245 should be exactly 10.1245
Then the object 10.1245 should not be null
Then the double value 10.1245 should be exactly 10.1245

title: Podam should handle both native and wrapped double values with @PodamDoubleValue annotation
